body: OMG, I 've been searching for some super rare translated Kekkai Sensen doujinshi-es  for years T.T  And you  made it!  I can't believe it!!! You even did for my OTP T.T THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR DO THIS <3 HOPE YOU WILL DO MORE ABOUT KEKKAI SENSEN (SPECIALLY  ABOUT KLAUS-SAMA) LOVE YOU AND ALWAYS SUPPORT YOU <3
